item.title: Becki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becki add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Becki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You have to believe. Otherwise, it will never happen." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "People think dreams aren't real just because they aren't made of matter, of particles. Dreams are real. But they are made of viewpoints, of images, of memories and puns and lost hopes." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becki add a quote by Laurell K. Hamilton
item.description: "Friends don't count the cost of favors." -- Laurell K. Hamilton

item.title: Becki add a quote by Tamora Pierce
item.description: "Every now and then I like to do as I'm told, just to confuse people." -- Tamora Pierce

item.title: Becki add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "A children's story that can only be enjoyed by children is not a good children's story in the slightest." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Becki add a quote by Michael Scott
item.description: "the best lie is wrapped around a core of truth" -- Michael Scott

item.title: Becki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Things need not have happened to be true. Tales and dreams are the shadow-truths that will endure when mere facts are dust and ashes, and forgot." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becki add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "No one knows for certain how much impact they have on the lives of other people. Oftentimes, we have no clue. Yet we push it just the same." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Becki add a quote by Jay Asher
item.description: "You don’t know what goes on in anyone’s life but your own. And when you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re not messing with just that part. Unfortunately, you can’t be that precise and selective. When you mess with one part of a person’s life, you’re messing with their entire life. Everything. . . affects everything." -- Jay Asher

item.title: Becki add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Becki add a quote by Melissa Marr
item.description: "Love makes you foolish. It makes you throw every bit of logic away, do stupid things, dangerous things." -- Melissa Marr

item.title: Becki add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
Becki add a quote by Glen Cook
item.description: "Morning is wonderful. Its only drawback is that it comes at such an inconvenient time of day." -- Glen Cook

item.title: Becki add a quote by Lorna Hopkins
item.description: "The meek shall inherit the earth. The rest of us will have escaped to the stars." -- Lorna Hopkins

item.title: Becki add a quote by Ally Carter
item.description: "I for one like chaos. Chaos looks good on me." -- Ally Carter

item.title: Becki add a quote by Ally Carter
item.description: "The things that are most precious to us are sometimes the most secret." -- Ally Carter

item.title: Becki add a quote by JK Rowling
item.description: "Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic. Capable of both inflicting injury, and remedying it." -- JK Rowling

item.title: Becki add a quote by Kendare Blake
item.description: "For the record I don't believe in Fate. I believe that the pieces have been placed. The ending hasn't been written yet." -- Kendare Blake

item.title: Becki add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "You get what anybody gets - you get a lifetime." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Becki add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Whether you come back by page or by the big screen, Hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Becki add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Harry Potter isn’t real? Oh no! Wait, wait, what do you mean by real? Is this video blog real? Am I real if you can see me and hear me, but only through the internet? Are you real if I can read your comment but I don’t know who you are or what your name is or where you’re from or what you look like or how old you are? I know all of those things about Harry Potter. Maybe Harry Potter’s real and you’re not." -- John Green

item.title: Becki add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Becki add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Becki add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Becki add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
